Articles.Content:
EDIT: I'm back! Thanks to the heroics of the various agencies at war with Mirror GregroxMun, I can finally rest in the place I belong. The shed behind the turntable.

That other GregroxMun is weak! He has let Kerbin fall into a democracy! He has had "fun" with the Hype Train Empire! This must not stand! I have come from the other cosmos to fix this! The Hype Train is no longer fun and games. We're taking over Kerbin!

> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Kd2b7PYyZic?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T16:46:54Z" title="07/17/2015 04:46  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**
\*Takes out nuclear Pulse pistol and shoots the evil copy\* Bad evil Gregrox! No snacks for you!
Oh crap! I declare war immediatly! Send in the spammers from Moonbase Alpha!

> 
> \*Takes out nuclear Pulse pistol and shoots the evil copy\* Bad evil Gregrox! No snacks for you!

> 
> Oh crap! I declare war immediatly! Send in the spammers from Moonbase Alpha!

Your petty blockades and spammers mean nothing to me. The Sudrian Military Program will crush you all. MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!

- - - Updated - - -

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/BVF9Q)

We have already conquered the Mun. No one can stop us now!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sfbsZRbwbJ4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T02:24:40Z" title="07/17/2015 02:24  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**
\*Reverses Voyager 1's trajectory back at Earth going twice as fast towards evil Gregrox\* ATTACK!!!

[http://imgur.com/gallery/b8xFT0Z/new](http://imgur.com/gallery/b8xFT0Z/new)

Surrender or die! Us Kaboomians have an arsenal enough to blow up Kerbin and the Mun!

If any one would like to help me in the fight against Greg, please post! We're all going towards one goal, and that is to defeat Greg. Allies are to change there title to Kaboomian Ally to join the alliance!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T03:06:44Z" title="07/17/2015 03:06  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by HoloYolo**
How do I change my title? Anyway, the United Provinces of Jewelian Nation-states are developing some highly experimental and destructive weaponry and would be happy to give you access to them.
Go to edit profile and scroll until you see edit title, and that's how you do it. Make sure you save though.
I found it. I will have the craft ready soon.

The United Kerbin Space Probe Agency has been restructured. It is now the Kerran Space Drone Force! Muahaha! No one can stop me! We've got a whole space program running now!

And finally we have some proper space suits!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/BEwN3)

> 
> I found it. I will have the craft ready soon.

Welcome Aboard.

> 
> Welcome Aboard.

How dare you build an alliance! We must conquer to ensure a controlled life for citizens of the Kerran Empire!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T03:33:37Z" title="07/17/2015 03:33  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

> 
> How dare you build an alliance! We must conquer to ensure a controlled life for citizens of the Kerran Empire!

Democracy and explosions for ALL!

Hello everybody. I'm Flymetothemun, Ambassador of the United Resistance Alliance. We simply ask that you let your train remain on its' tracks. We have mercenary scouts on every hilltop, in every valley, on every plateau, on every plain, on every planet, in every sector of space, and everywhere in between, and as soon as we receive word that your train is off the tracks we will begin nuclear artillery fire and will attempt to board and/or fire on you with our space gunships. Thank you, be safe, and have a great day.

Don't you get it? You can't win! We found a Starship hidden away in a hangar, so we put it in a retrograde orbit!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/IdLZW)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Hello everybody. I'm Flymetothemun, Ambassador of the United Resistance Alliance. We simply ask that you let your train remain on its' tracks. We have mercenary scouts on every hilltop, in every valley, on every plateau, on every plain, on every planet, in every sector of space, and everywhere in between, and as soon as we receive word that your train is off the tracks we will begin nuclear artillery fire and will attempt to board and/or fire on you with our space gunships. Thank you, be safe, and have a great day.

Your empty threats mean nothing to our HYPE SHIELDS!

> 
> Hello everybody. I'm Flymetothemun, Ambassador of the United Resistance Alliance. We simply ask that you let your train remain on its' tracks. We have mercenary scouts on every hilltop, in every valley, on every plateau, on every plain, on every planet, in every sector of space, and everywhere in between, and as soon as we receive word that your train is off the tracks we will begin nuclear artillery fire and will attempt to board and/or fire on you with our space gunships. Thank you, be safe, and have a great day.

You're gonna start a three-way war! Let us fight! This is not your problem!

*guys its me. i found a way of linking 2 cosmoses back together. Ment 2 B shortcut for hypetrain. Evil twin got thru. i hope thers been no troubl with the intruder. -GregroxMun Prime*

EDIT: HOW DARE HE TRY AND GET BACK! He opened the gate himself, he invited me in!
Where are you getting Hype for your Hype Shields?

> 
> Where are you getting Hype for your Hype Shields?

We must get our top scientists to research this "HypeShield"

*hes gettng it from hom univrs. I need hype for my retrn portal. Pls gt rlly excitd abt gettng me home so i cn charge portal. I shld be abl 2 get back in lss thn a day if i get it right -GregroxMun Prime*

> 
> You're gonna start a three-way war! Let us fight! This is not your problem!

Okay. I've transmitted this message to our scouts and they said that they'd like to be color commentators and field reporters. In response to this, we've activated plan 35-F to create a new TV channel called "The Space Sports Network", or SSN, and this fight will be our first and featured attraction. There are camera kits en route to each of our scouts. Thank you for making us even richer.

Have a great day,

Flymetothemun, Ambassador, URA.
I shall rest for the night. You imbeciles can try all you want, but the shield will hold for at least 12 more hours with all the Hype I have stored from my home cosmos.
I have tested my new craft.

--FILES INTERCEPTED FROM CRIT LABS--

X-55 Kaboom Tank.

This is a tank with double plate armor for defence.

2 Tank Cannons and loads of missiles alongside a laser for offence.

This tank shall be truly feared.

Lazer Mazer

This is a supercharged lazer.

Opinions on the three powers

Team Hype is Stupid alongside team kaboom!

Hype should be Illegal!

However,GregoxMun the second has a great allience. We might side with him.
gReEn IrOn CrOwN aPrOvEs Of ThIs... (I tHiNk)
